code: import React from'react';import'./FilterStyles.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DecadeFilter=_ref=>{let{selectedDecades,onDecadeChange,onClearFilters}=_ref;const decades=['60s','70s','80s','90s','2000s'];const handleDecadeChange=decade=>{const updatedDecades=selectedDecades.includes(decade)?selectedDecades.filter(d=>d!==decade):[...selectedDecades,decade];onDecadeChange(updatedDecades);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Decade"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:onClearFilters,className:"clear-filter-btn","aria-label":"Clear decade filters",children:"Clear"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-options decades",children:decades.map(decade=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"filter-option decade-option",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:selectedDecades.includes(decade),onChange:()=>handleDecadeChange(decade)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"checkbox-custom"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"option-label",children:decade})]},decade))})]});};export default DecadeFilter;
